name: HeadsUp
tagline: The first AI competitor monitoring agent
description: Are you falling behind your competitors? HeadsUp is the first AI agent that alerts you to competitor moves and helps you respond. Get instant insights then real-time alerts. Setup in 60 secs and HeadsUp runs on autopilot.

name: Slashy
tagline: ChatGPT with Hands
description: All you need to do is think, Slashy does the work. It connects to your apps, remembers what matters, and gets things done without the endless switching, searching, or starting over.

name: Higgsfield Product-to-Video
tagline: Your sketch turns into a cinema in a second.
description: Drop your product straight into the pic. Or start blank & build your MOST SELLING frame from 0. This is POWERFUL: Perfect Product Placement with 0 prompts & ALL our models.

name: ChatGPT Query Gold
tagline: Find high buy intent search queries for ChatGPT
description: Query Gold lets you find high buy intent search queries for ChatGPT that you can use for content marketing and SEO.

name: Kuzco
tagline: Open-source Swift package to run LLMs locally on iOS & macOS
description: Kuzco is a Swift package for integrating large language models (LLMs) directly into iOS, macOS, and Mac Catalyst apps. Built on `llama.cpp`, it offers customizable prompts, flexible tuning, and async/await-friendly APIs for on-device AI.

name: Channel3
tagline: API to find any product and earn commission on sales
description: Channel3 lets you search the world’s products and monetize recommendations. Get structured, deduplicated, AI-ready product data for your app or agent.

name: Well Extension
tagline: Save time and effort by automating your document retrieval
description: Well becomes every founder’s best friend when accounting season hits. It automates supplier invoice & receipt collection and pipes the data directly into your accounting tools, ERP, or dashboards — with zero effort.

name: Shimmer Community Membership
tagline: The all-in-one platform to manage & grow with ADHD
description: We took everything we learned from 60,000+ ADHD coaching sessions and built a far more accessible membership platform for growth with ADHD. Get science-backed knowledge, accountability, and people who get it, all in one place.

name: Postel
tagline: Your unfair advantage for 𝕏 / Twitter growth
description: Postel is your personal brand assistant for 𝕏 that combines content ideation, creation & scheduling. Study viral posts, build a knowledge base, write like any creator, schedule to 𝕏 (including communities) & repurpose from YouTube, Reels & Blogs.

name: Unlazy Writer
tagline: Don’t outsource your thinking to AI
description: Write with clarity while staying sharp, with real-time context from the most relevant sources and tools to keep your writing accurate.

name: Wolfgang AI
tagline: Your personal game master anywhere and at any time
description: Wolfgang AI - Your personal game master for solo RPG adventures. Open-source, privacy-focused, with near unlimited context for epic storytelling sessions. Use either on the website or locally on your machine or server!

name: Anime Vault
tagline: Share your Anime Database with the Community.
description: AnimeVault- Discover, organize, and share your anime journey with the community. The world's most interesting anime database, made for fans.

name: PM Guide - Product Management Frameworks
tagline: An interactive guide with 20+ PM frameworks and simulators
description: PM Guide - Product Management Framework Library A comprehensive platform with 20+ interactive frameworks, simulators, and real-world case studies for product managers. 🎯 Perfect for: • Product Managers • Product Owners • Startup Founders • Business Analysts

name: Flare
tagline: Turn Ideas Into Sales, In Seconds.
description: Generate high-converting marketing content in seconds. Flare helps creators, solopreneurs, and small businesses launch scroll-stopping campaigns effortlessly using AI.

name: Reef - Excel Builder
tagline: Chat to Excel — downloadable model with formulas included
description: Reef lets you turn a simple chat into a complete financial model instantly. Describe your business or analysis needs and download a well-formatted Excel file with formulas for projections, forecasts, and ROI. No templates. No manual work. Just chat → Excel.

name: Startup Deck Review
tagline: Upload your deck, get investor feedback in 48 hours.
description: Most founders that reach out to me end up asking for my feedback on their startup investment deck. Sometimes, this is what founders need, quick feedback in written format and sometimes following a call. You simply upload your deck and get feedback.

name: Valueglyph
tagline: Stocks and company fundamentals, simplified for mobile.
description: Valueglyph makes company fundamental analysis simple and mobile. View financials, track trends, check valuations, and follow key events, all without the clutter of traditional tools. Focus on what matters, anytime, anywhere.

name: HTMLSync
tagline: Run your AI-generated HTML app on every device, instantly
description: Upload the single HTML file that your favorite AI tool generated. We host it and keep its data in sync - no servers, no code

name: BestStock AI
tagline: AI-Powered Stock Analysis Platform for Smarter Investments
description: BestStock AI is your comprehensive AI-powered stock analysis platform, providing institutional-grade financial data, advanced analytics, and intelligent conversational AI to simplify and enhance your investment decisions.

name: GenghisAI – 5 AIs, 1 Smarter Answer
tagline: AI innovation with purpose — charity built in
description: GenghisAI merges five leading AI models into one superior answer and donates 50% of profits to social good.
